<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="note"
      version="1.0"><info>
    <id />
    <title />
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated></info><macro name="title-or-title-and-translator">
    <choose>
      <if type="webpage">
        <text macro="title"/>
      </if>
      <else>
        <text macro="title" suffix=", "/>
        <names variable="translator">
          <name/>
        </names>
      </else>
    </choose></macro><macro name="title">
    <text variable="title"/></macro><citation>
    <layout>
      <group delimiter=": ">
        <names variable="author">
          <name name-as-sort-order="all">
            <name-part name="family" text-case="uppercase"/>
          </name>
          <substitute>
            <text macro="title-or-title-and-translator"/>
          </substitute>
        </names>
        <text variable="title" text-case="uppercase"/>
      </group>
    </layout></citation></style>
